body_html: I'm open to doing this but it might entail making re2 more portable, or whipping something up in Ragel. I'm not sure if we have time for that now. A workaround exists. It's also possible to build custom ops with re2 which is already in the Bazel codebase. I'm leaning towards closing and possibly revisiting later. Pinging @vrv for a second glance.
